Breadth-First.Explanation: Initial broad observation and listing possible sites (Seven Sisters vs Beachy Head) without deep verification.
Continued divergent consideration of orientation, time of day, and multiple nearby beaches (Cuckmere Haven, Birling Gap) without final commitment.

Depth-First.Explanation: Convergent verification of a specific hypothesis (Birling Gap) based on distinctive cliff and beach features.
Pinpointing the exact hamlet (Birling Gap, East Dean) to confirm the location hypothesis.
Detailed analysis of key distinguishing clues (chalk steps, pebble beach, vegetation, lighting) to uniquely identify the Seven Sisters at Birling Gap.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Chalk-white cliffs and pebble beach features

Depth-First.Explanation: Final restatement of the confirmed location.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Birling Gap, Seven Sisters Country Park

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shift from exploring multiple hypotheses and orientations to focused verification of a single location (Birling Gap).
